char_info.char_desc: The Queen of the Yao Tribe

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: If anyone dares to challenge Gensokyo's dimensions through manipulation, I must purge them.
Purge what!?

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: There you are. Why must humanoids and youkai-borns suffer these problems?

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I wanted every woman in Gensokyo to have hair as long as their body!

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Whenever a youkai-born conducts an experiment, nothing ever goes right.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Every day, something will happen that angers either race.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: As the scrolls of history roll for millennia, there will never seem to be any end.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: True. Some people become sad when things have to change.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: But for heaven's sake. This hair is making me a complete imbecile.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Everyone in the Daily Bunbunmaru knows about this hair issue that has also affected me.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Are your rants a joke?

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: No! Gensokyo does not deserve any tengu with hair that looks like a long bridal veil.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: That's what I wore when I married my husband.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Even though your spell put a smile on your own face, it didn't for me!

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Don't get angry. This is supposed to be fun.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: Reimu has said this hair is so annoying. She or I can't stand seeing ourselves like this.

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I'm going to end this.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: End this? Are you wanting to fight me?

t_scene_info.speaker: Aya:
t_scene_info.dialogue: My rants and danmaku will continue until this spell is shut off.

t_scene_info.speaker: Yuugiku:
t_scene_info.dialogue: I won't be happy if you win...
